about_the_game:
Yet another grave has been desecrated, and the body stolen. The townsfolk, gripped by fear, hesitate to bury their loved ones and weave increasingly absurd tales to make sense of the events. The Alchemist, as the press has named the culprit, is whispered to possess the power to resurrect the dead and transmute lead into gold. At the request of the police, private detective Arthur Hart takes on the task of unraveling this mysterious case.

Strange Case is a first-person view horror point-and-click adventure anthology comprising three games:

  • The Alchemist
  • Escape from Asylum
  • Ghost Train

All of them have been fully remastered with new 4K hand-drawn artwork.

Key Features:

  • Classic point-and-click gameplay
  • Numerous challenging puzzles, riddles, and mini-games
  • Thrilling and engaging storyline with a horror atmosphere
  • Creepy characters, each with their own story
  • Achievements: try to find them all

content_descriptors.notes: This game has a horror atmosphere and includes some scenes of moderate fantasy violence and blood.
